caption:
ESCAPE TO THE HAIR SPA - In 1990, Biolage presented to stylists and salons a new proposition that blended professional haircare with spa therapies. By combining relaxing head massages with the uplifting fragrance of our products, stylists could turn regular salon services into memorable experiences and clients could experience an escape from their fast-paced lifestyle. This remains true to us today as Biolage continues to provide a therapeutic journey that gets to the root of  your hair and scalp needs. ​

#hairspa #professionalhaircare #spatherapy #headmassage
